channel.title: Forgotten-Pixels -New Server Looking For Staff Drop Party At 10! Players
channel.description:
Features
Working Summoning
1-99 dungeoneering with rewards
All spirit shields
All parts of nex armour
Dicing
Minigames
Duel Arena | Barrows |Tzhaar |pest control And Warriors guild |
23 fully working skills
Chaotics with Dungeoneering
Fully working minigames
full godwars dungeon
farming
chaos elemental
Working Skillcape emotes
Barrow gloves etc...
and many more
MEDIA
All the nex armours (click links to see picture)
Torva
[img]http://gyazo.com/cfd6f1a4ec5fbe8305982ebf45760bcb]http://gyazo.com/cfd6f1a4ec5fbe8305982ebf45760bcb[/img]
Virtus
[img]http://gyazo.com/52c6d5e00e355024ead9b4e5f8f1da9a]http://gyazo.com/52c6d5e00e355024ead9b4e5f8f1da9a[/img]
Pernix (Pernix is glitched sorry for that)
Working summoning tab (interface)
[img]http://[url=http://gyazo.com/fb151120bb5ddef26dedee40383c6ba5]http://gyazo.com/fb151120bb5ddef26dedee40383c6ba5[/url][/img]
Working summoning familliar following
[url=http://gyazo.com/1fb8d6c73499d856214886023ffc8bc1]http://gyazo.com/1fb8d6c73499d856214886023ffc8bc1[/url]
Working Quickchat when u click on a icon
[url=http://gyazo.com/31b568eda16de241da4a392747b6e231]http://gyazo.com/31b568eda16de241da4a392747b6e231[/url]
Working Squeel of Fortuna
[url=http://gyazo.com/2de46bb0b0b1e297ba84cb9d688bafa4]http://gyazo.com/2de46bb0b0b1e297ba84cb9d688bafa4[/url]
Allot of Bosses
[url=http://gyazo.com/27f52c35ab14adf7a2929610831e0eae]http://gyazo.com/27f52c35ab14adf7a2929610831e0eae[/url]
Working Curses
[url=http://gyazo.com/b3d467b7e6b7619363074346dc0e2940]http://gyazo.com/b3d467b7e6b7619363074346dc0e2940[/url]
Minigame teleports
[url=http://gyazo.com/15ee23e15d185493e5f8a3906e3938f3]http://gyazo.com/15ee23e15d185493e5f8a3906e3938f3[/url]
Monster Teleports
[url=http://gyazo.com/16ac8ef0340215b1ae8b8a52927de05f]http://gyazo.com/16ac8ef0340215b1ae8b8a52927de05f[/url]

[url=http://gyazo.com/c894a379afd6ba708120ea244ad7318d]http://gyazo.com/c894a379afd6ba708120ea244ad7318d[/url] Skilling area Skill Teleport
[url=http://gyazo.com/8285fb712ea2ed9332bafc8692b30212]http://gyazo.com/8285fb712ea2ed9332bafc8692b30212[/url]
That are not all teleports but there are some that are pointless so i dont show them
Working skillcape Emotes
[url=http://gyazo.com/8873f8e0132bb1b5f21272355c22c554]http://gyazo.com/8873f8e0132bb1b5f21272355c22c554[/url]
Dungeoneering reward shop
[url=http://gyazo.com/5a5eb8c01c4fb2a9d579732815b3aa61]http://gyazo.com/5a5eb8c01c4fb2a9d579732815b3aa61[/url]
Dung reward shop 2#
[url=http://gyazo.com/84cb29c973fea964f620711480e1bdc2]http://gyazo.com/84cb29c973fea964f620711480e1bdc2[/url]
Dung reward shop 3#
[url=http://gyazo.com/6306c4da466dcdd54532c052776399b2]http://gyazo.com/6306c4da466dcdd54532c052776399b2[/url]
Dung Inside (note do ur arm and weapons off)
[url=http://gyazo.com/f736d101c5789d3c32066d65d9246ab4]http://gyazo.com/f736d101c5789d3c32066d65d9246ab4[/url]
Hunter Area
[url=http://gyazo.com/49d020dced1b0fc9b7552b4c7fd20829]http://gyazo.com/49d020dced1b0fc9b7552b4c7fd20829[/url]
Slayer point shop
[url=http://gyazo.com/e1d8fd551caf523ced093ae2a2a8fb18]http://gyazo.com/e1d8fd551caf523ced093ae2a2a8fb18[/url]
The Jail
[url=http://gyazo.com/c8f753362322bf354e248725477a5202]http://gyazo.com/c8f753362322bf354e248725477a5202[/url]
The ban hammer (i hope this never happens to u but u can always appeal it or get a second chanche) it depends on what u did do
[url=http://gyazo.com/d43ffce5d299dae8065ddf7751fa9521]http://gyazo.com/d43ffce5d299dae8065ddf7751fa9521[/url]
And yeah we got many more things shops etc.... other cool commands but here is a little tutorial on how to join my server for the moment since its Hamachi hosted will be upgraded to vps when we rectieve donations First u download hamachi easy to find open it up then go to my network its dutch for me but i transelate it so : u do that
[url=http://gyazo.com/c019df6c0b33b67225f561cc8796d45b]http://gyazo.com/c019df6c0b33b67225f561cc8796d45b[/url]
Then go to the second option like this:
[url=http://gyazo.com/28bb73d7c17146cce2a90ec4d61705a9]http://gyazo.com/28bb73d7c17146cce2a90ec4d61705a9[/url]
Then normally something would pop up like this with Network id: type: Forgotten-Pixels
Then password is 123 go to the webclient this link: http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Forgotten-Pixels and u would be normally able to play
(NOTE IF U SEE THAT THE SERVER IS OFFLINE OR U CANT CONNECT TO IT IT IS PROBALLY CAUSE IM AT SCHOOL WITH MY PC OFF OR LOST INTERNET CONNECTION)
I Would also like to give allot of credits and thx for making it to: Trisida he is the maker of the source and the client so check out his awsome stuff to
and i want also thank Moparscape and the staffs for being loyal and making and putting effort in it to edit people their posts and be able to advertise my server on here thanks allot!
Another Note im searching for a nice trust worthy Coder he will be the second owner off the game so respect him and the first 2 people to join gets Moderator and from moderator we still see how u do + the other 5 people that join Will win donator status! and at 10 players online we go do a drop party :)!!!!!
ive made a forums but there is still currently need to work on so sorry for that but thats the link: [url=http://forgottenpixels.lefora.com]http://forgottenpixels.lefora.com[/url] so yeah this was it thx guys and plz a mod or admin of moparscape if u detect something i did wrong or was againste the rules plz dont remove it i did read the rules and i think i did follow them all but ok cya guys!!!!! hope we see u online :) oh yeah and sorry that it are all links dont know yet how to show it as a picture :p

item.title: Forgotten-Pixels -New Server Looking For Staff Drop Party At 10! Players
item.dc:creator: @yeaa_buddy yeaa buddy
item.description:
@yeaa_buddy wrote:

Apachee:

Kid are u retarded 1. Im new to coding so dont expect like im that good 2.l2 portforward kid rofl i wathced over 100 guides for it and with that ipconfig thing if u type in 127.0.0.1 at the top bar to login as admin i connect to nothing so its hamachi for the moment 3. i think ur a fucking retard who cant read before they post anything k. -Apachee oh yeah and all credits are giving to trisida

Ok, so “and with that ipconfig thing if u type in 127.0.0.1 at the top bar to login as admin i connect to nothing” Yea, NO SHIT.

Open CMD > ipconfig > default gateway.
If you tried putting 127.0.0.1 in the browser and tried logging in you shouldn’t have a server.

Read full topic
item.source: Forgotten-Pixels -New Server Looking For Staff Drop Party At 10! Players

item.title: Forgotten-Pixels -New Server Looking For Staff Drop Party At 10! Players
item.dc:creator: @Ashley3 Ashley
item.description:
@Ashley3 wrote:

You are never going to get players using Hamachi. Try following step-by-step guides for portforwarding, or use utorrent as stated above.

Read full topic
